response.overview: Büşra, Selçuk, Beyaz and Kübra are young people who have been friends since primary school. Among them, only Kübra attends university. When they are adults, Büşra's relationship with İlker turns into a marriage. Kübra, who studies the university away from home, decides to return to the village after graduation. Kübra, who goes to the village against her father's wishes, begins to stay with İlker and Büşra. In this process, Kübra, who is jealous of her sister's marriage, interferes with the magicians in order to spoil their happiness.
response.title: Azamet
